message: Let's start fair. I'm offering a 55/45 split. We can work out the details later.
Your initial offer was a good starting point, Alice. Now it's my turn to propose a 55/45 split in my favor. Let's settle this quickly and avoid further losses from inflation.
Let's be reasonable, Bob. Inflation is hurting us both. I'm proposing a 50/50 split. It's the fairest way to proceed at this point.
